text:
When using a block-container element, the break-before and break-after 
attributes do not function.

I have tried "before-after="page" and break-before="page" and neither of them 
cause a page break.
creator: kunwin@westpac.com.au

text:
Correction to first post:

I have tried "break-after="page" and break-before="page" and neither of them 
cause a page break.
creator: kunwin@westpac.com.au
pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text: Bug fixed in latest Trunk (rev 584703), and probably in FOP 0.94

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
